title: Key Benefits
subtitle: Control your finances intelligently and enjoy a simple and effective experience.

items.title: Easy and fast expense tracking
items.description: Record expenses with a simple WhatsApp message, no need to open another app.

items.title: Web platform for detailed analysis
items.description: Access a web platform to view all your financial data in detail.

items.title: Personalized savings advice
items.description: Receive recommendations based on your financial behavior to improve your habits.
